channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Beyerdynamic's Amiron 300 Are Cheaper Than Ever
item.description: The Beyerdynamic Amiron 300 hit their lowest price yet.

item.title: This Thiel-backed venture allows doping in its own sports
item.description: Backed by Peter Thiel and Donald Trump Jr.’s 1789 Capital, the Enhanced Games aims to disrupt the Olympics with a competition that allows athletes to ...

item.title: Spotify spotted working on a ‘SongDNA’ feature that showcases the people behind your favorite music
item.description: Spotify is developing a new “SongDNA” feature that lets users explore music through the people behind it — from writers and producers to vocalists and...

item.title: Eightfold co-founders raise $35M for Viven, an AI digital twin startup for querying unavailable co-workers
item.description: Viven's seed funding was led by Khosla Ventures and Foundation Capital.

item.title: Anthropic launches new version of scaled-down ‘Haiku’ model
item.description: Anthropic has released Claude Haiku 4.5, the newest version of its smallest model, billed as offering similar performance to Sonnet 4 "at one-third th...

item.title: The AI Industry’s Scaling Obsession Is Headed for a Cliff
item.description: Huge AI infrastructure deals assume that algorithms will keep improving with scale. They may not.

item.title: Best Noise-Canceling Headphones (2025): Sony, Bose, and More
item.description: Tune out (or rock out) with our favorite over-ears and earbuds.

item.title: 10 Great Gifts for Mom: Ideas for the Best Mother (2025)
item.description: From high-tech skin care to cool accessories, these are our favorite picks for the WIRED mom in your life.

item.title: The Best Travel Tote for Every Kind of Trip (2025)
item.description: These hard-working travel totes handle everything from a work trip to a weekend getaway.

item.title: Apple adds 650 megawatts of renewables in Europe with more coming in China
item.description: Apple is adding renewable power to offset customer charging and support its operations, including third-party manufacturing in China.
